info.comment:
I remixed! Remix and add new techno moosik! Also, draw another person. Dont color over mine. I did draw it on scratch, but that doesnt change anything... no stealing... and dont take the music please it is a remix of bulletproof that i got by my self....

This character is Niji. Her name means "rainbow". Get it? She wears rainbowish colors. Except, pink isnt on the rainbow, but whatever... it means shes colorful....

she is an anthro...

from Misutari Island...

it means "Mystery Island"...

the characters on the island are all anthros..

yeah....

long story...

its a character from Akitchi Sayonara...

havent seen one of those in a long time have ya??

well, i changed the plot back to how it was when i started a LONG time ago...

yeah....

i have to draw a pic for 4H thingy at the fair before it starts...

it will be black and white...

i think i am doing animals...

if you could see my notebook, youd say, "Uh, YEAH. u DEFIATELY should do them"...

they are better than before....

yerp...

kthnxbye
